nodes.label: let sender_info = ctx . accounts . sender . to_account_info () ;
let receiver_info = ctx . accounts . receiver . to_account_info () ;
* * sender_info . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? = sender_info . lamports () . checked_sub (amount) . unwrap () ;
* * receiver_info . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? = receiver_info . lamports () . checked_add (amount) . unwrap () ;
